description: Episode number 8 of Series "This Modern Age" Discusses the dispute between Egypt and England over the future of the Anglo-Egyptian Sudan. As a background, it shows the nature of the peoples who inhabit the area and claims that improvements in health services, education and agriculture are the result of British administration.
